Shade:YorickSkull.NAME: Yorick's Skull
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with a zombie. Whenever you play #b10 cards, summon a zombie.

Shade:YorickPolishedSkull.NAME: Yorick's Polished Skull
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with a zombie, a skeleton, and [E] . Whenever you play #b10 cards, summon a zombie, a skeleton, and gain [E] .

Shade:Thing.NAME: Thing
DESCRIPTIONS: When you exhume a card from your exhaust to your hand or deck, gain 3 block.
